text: Microeurydemus africanus is a species of leaf beetle. It is distributed in the Central African Republic, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Saudi Arabia, Yemen, Eritrea and Sudan. It was first described by Martin Jacoby in 1900. ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Beetles of Africa Category:Beetles of Asia Category:Taxa named by Martin Jacoby Category:Beetles described in 1900
title: Microeurydemus africanus
